name: The system loves me
description: “The system loves me” — the series of two works depicting N-police as representatives of bdsm culture. Here is the typical N-police department where criminals are brought. Policeman looks like slave and there are themed items next to him — this is how I want to reflect popular cases of torture in police departments towards the police. In this game policemen aren’t dominants, they are the ones who love to be hurt and humiliated. My work is a participant of several exhibitions in Moscow.
